entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 10 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 10 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
